item.title: Blockchain and cryptography: an introduction
item.description: I felt like continuing with the buzzwords run, and also learn something completely new. So today I’m gonna talk a little bit about on how blockchains actually work, and write some psuedo-code. What is a blockchain? From Wikipedia - A blockchain is a growing list of records, called blocks, that are linked using cryptography. Each block contains a cryptographic hash of the previous block, a timestamp, and transaction data. This wasn’t complicated at all.
